notes.text:
An update is available for compiler-rt, lldb, lld, llvm, llvm-toolset, clang, libomp, python-lit.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
LLVM Toolset provides the LLVM compiler infrastructure framework, the Clang compiler for the C and C++ languages, the LLDB debugger, and related tools for code analysis.

Bug Fixes:

* bpftrace pointer reads wrong value unless read twice (BZ#1978498)

* The .x86_64 and .i686 arch of llvm-test-11.0.0-2.module+el8.4.0+8598+a071fcd5 conflict with each other and should not (BZ#1984617)

This advisory is provided by Ctrl IQ, Inc for Rocky Linux systems. For more information about CIQ security practices, visit https://ciq.com/security.
notes.title: Description

references.summary: * The .x86_64 and .i686 arch of llvm-test-11.0.0-2.module+el8.4.0+8598+a071fcd5 conflict with each other and should not
